name: Death Knight

skills.name: Mutilate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Ancient Seal
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Death's Vigor
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
